Documentation des fonctions membres
constructHistory() constructHistoryLog LogconstructHistory
static constructHistory (CommonDBTM $item, $oldvalues, $values)[static]
Construct history for an item
Paramètres
$item
CommonDBTM object
$oldvalues
array of old values updated
$values
array of all values of the item
Renvoie
boolean for success (at least 1 log entry added)
displayTabContentForItem() displayTabContentForItemLog LogdisplayTabContentForItem
static displayTabContentForItem (CommonGLPI $item, $tabnum = 1 , $withtemplate = 0 )[static]
show Tab content
Depuis
0.83
Paramètres
CommonGLPI$item
Item on which the tab need to be displayed
integer$tabnum
tab number (default 1)
integer$withtemplate
is a template object ? (default 0)
Renvoie
boolean
Réimplémentée à partir de CommonGLPI.
getHistoryData() getHistoryDataLog LoggetHistoryData
static getHistoryData (CommonDBTM $item, $start = 0 , $limit = 0 , array $sqlfilters = [] )[static]
Retrieve last history Data for an item
Paramètres
CommonDBTM$item
Object instance
integer$start
First line to retrieve (default 0)
integer$limit
Max number of line to retrieve (0 for all) (default 0)
array$sqlfilters
SQL filters applied to history (default [])
Renvoie
array of localized log entry (TEXT only, no HTML)
